languages.text: "Жалкие оправдания. Похоже, ржавчина жрет не только контейнеры, но и арбитров. В моем отчете маршалу будет расписана твоя некомпетентность — молись, чтобы ты отделалась только разжалованием".

"Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."
languages.original_text: "Жалкие оправдания. Похоже, ржавчина жрет не только контейнеры, но и арбитров. В моем отчете маршалу будет расписана твоя некомпетентность — молись, чтобы ты отделалась только разжалованием".

languages.text: «Sus excusas son patéticas. Parece que el óxido no solo está carcomiendo los contenedores, sino también los Arbitrator. Mi informe al Mariscal resaltará su incompetencia. Rece para salir de esta con una simple degradación».
languages.original_text: "Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."

traits.locale_text: «Sus excusas son patéticas. Parece que el óxido no solo está carcomiendo los contenedores, sino también los Arbitrator. Mi informe al Mariscal resaltará su incompetencia. Rece para salir de esta con una simple degradación».

languages.text: “何等可悲的借口。看来，被腐蚀的不仅仅是那些集装箱，还有你们这些法务官的脑子。我会向元帅忠实地汇报你的无能表现，希望你仅仅是降职了事。”
languages.original_text: "Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."

traits.locale_text: “何等可悲的借口。看来，被腐蚀的不仅仅是那些集装箱，还有你们这些法务官的脑子。我会向元帅忠实地汇报你的无能表现，希望你仅仅是降职了事。”

languages.text: 「下手な言い訳だ。コンテナだけでなく、アービトレイターもさびに浸食されているようだ。将帥への報告ではお前の無能さを報告することになるだろう。左遷だけで済むことを祈るよ」
languages.original_text: "Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."

traits.locale_text: 「下手な言い訳だ。コンテナだけでなく、アービトレイターもさびに浸食されているようだ。将帥への報告ではお前の無能さを報告することになるだろう。左遷だけで済むことを祈るよ」

languages.text: « Épargnez-nous vos faux-fuyants. Apparemment, la rouille ne s'attaque pas seulement aux conteneurs, mais aussi aux arbitrators eux-mêmes. Je ne manquerai pas d'informer le maréchal de votre incompétence en rédigeant mon rapport. Priez pour vous en tirer avec une simple rétrogradation. »
languages.original_text: "Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."

traits.locale_text: « Épargnez-nous vos faux-fuyants. Apparemment, la rouille ne s'attaque pas seulement aux conteneurs, mais aussi aux arbitrators eux-mêmes. Je ne manquerai pas d'informer le maréchal de votre incompétence en rédigeant mon rapport. Priez pour vous en tirer avec une simple rétrogradation. »

languages.text: "Zavallıca bir bahane. Anlaşılan sadece konteynerler değil, Yargıcılar da pas tutmuş. Miralay'a vereceğim raporla beceriksizliğini gözler önüne sereceğim. Dua et de olacaklar sadece rütbe tenziliyle kalsın."
languages.original_text: "Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallıca bir bahane. Anlaşılan sadece konteynerler değil, Yargıcılar da pas tutmuş. Miralay'a vereceğim raporla beceriksizliğini gözler önüne sereceğim. Dua et de olacaklar sadece rütbe tenziliyle kalsın."

languages.text: "Armselige Ausflüchte. Offenbar nagt der Rost nicht nur an den Containern, sondern auch an den Arbitratoren. Ich werde Eure Inkompetenz in meinem Bericht an den Marschall erwähnen. Ihr solltet beten, dass Ihr nur degradiert werdet."
languages.original_text: "Pathetic excuses. It seems the rust is eating away not only at the containers, but at the Arbitrators as well. My report to the Marshal will outline your incompetence. Pray you get off with just a demotion."
